methods.name: accordion_panel
methods.description: Returns the accordion panel ([](:class:`~shiny.playwright.controls.AccordionPanel`)) with the specified data value.

methods.name: expect_class
methods.description: Expects the accordion to have the specified class.

methods.name: expect_height
methods.description: Expects the accordion to have the specified height.

methods.name: expect_multiple
methods.description: Expects the accordion to be multiple or not.

methods.name: expect_panels
methods.description: Expects the accordion to have the specified panels.

methods.name: expect_width
methods.description: Expects the accordion to have the specified width.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets the state of the accordion panel.

methods.name: expect_body
methods.description: Expects the accordion panel body to have the specified text.

methods.name: expect_icon
methods.description: Expects the accordion panel icon to exist or not.

methods.name: expect_label
methods.description: Expects the accordion panel label to have the specified text.

methods.name: expect_open
methods.description: Expects the accordion panel to be open or closed.

methods.name: expect_width
methods.description: Expect the `width` attribute of a DOM element to have a specific value.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets the state of the control to open or closed.
